alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 3:30AM AKST until December 07 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM WEDNESDAY TO 3 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...From 3 AM Wednesday to 3 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting up to 40 mph at times Wednesday will result in blowing snow which may reduce visibility to 1/2 mile.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp
